attributes.action: re-open Bojangles, 1 Drake Street, Rochdale, OL16 1RE
attributes.additional_details:
Details:
On Christmas eve 2011 an incident took place
in Sinclairs bar, above Bojangles (not in Bojangles).
Since this the Bojangles venue has been closed.

We the undersigned want Bojangles to re-open.
As Bojangles provides local people with a place of work.Plus we all enjoy visiting Rochdale town center at the weekends to attend Bojangles for social nights out.
We feel Rochdale town needs this weekend social venue, If it remains closed it will be a sad loss to us all and another business closed in the town center.

WE WANT BOJANGLES TO RE-OPEN !.
